x-kubernetes-validations.message: Invalid configuration: When 'mysql.clusterType' is set to 'async', 'orchestrator.enabled' must be true unless 'unsafeFlags.orchestrator' is enabled
Invalid configuration: When 'mysql.clusterType' is set to 'async', 'proxy.haproxy.enabled' must be true unless 'unsafeFlags.proxy' is enabled
Invalid configuration: When 'mysql.clusterType' is set to 'async', 'proxy.router.enabled' must be disabled
